comment: Great app. Too bad it crashes in Android 4.4

Strangely the program started in German for me even though I live in London. I couldn't see how to change the language even though I speak a tiny bit of German.  I then had an error saying (in English) that the media server had died. I waited and tried again and was now shown a broad list of product catagories (in German again) - I thought the idea was that these programs just scan the barcode and then tell you about the product.   It might just be an issue with my device as it has the most recent android.
title: Didn't work for me

comment: I love the app and idea behind it coz the most telling info about a product is its ingredients and not beautiful lables on the package front, and not third party magical reviews and "experts" opinions. Thanks! Had no problems with the app.
